bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for the Application of Separable Insulated Connectors
Redline
IEEE Guide for the Application of Separable Insulated Connectors - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 1215-2013 (Revision of IEEE Std 1215-2001) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: General information on the application and operation of separable connectors is provided in this guide. It is intended to be basic and supplement the manufacturers specific recommendations and established utility practices.

General information on the application and operation of separable connectors is provided in this guide. It is intended to be basic and supplement the manufacturers specific recommendations and established utility practices.
